meanings: 초대와 방문 Can I get you something to drink?

vlive.korean: 한 잔만? - 많이 마실 거야? Just one? - You're going to drink a lot? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!

vlive.korean: 맥주 마실 건데~ I'm going to drink beer~ 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 짠! 러브들 고마워요🍋
